bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas
bibl.note: P. Thomas 1-31. - Pp. xiii-xxi: Bibliography of J. David Thomas. - I. Essays. [Nos 1-9.] - II. Texts [Nos 1-31, including 2 ostraca, 2 inscriptions and 3 mummy labels.] - III. Indices.
bibl.seg: GAGOS Traianos and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas. (American Studies in Papyrology. 42.)
Oakville, Connecticut, American Society of Papyrologists, 2001, 4°, xxii-287 pp., 1 portrait et 24 pll. ISBN 0-9700591-3-2. $45.
P. Thomas 1-31. - Pp. xiii-xxi: Bibliography of J. David Thomas. - I. Essays. [Nos 1-9.] - II. Texts [Nos 1-31, including 2 ostraca, 2 inscriptions and 3 mummy labels.] - III. Indices.
S.E.G. L, 1563 (A. Lukaszewicz, pp. 125-129); LI, 2134 (H. Cuvigny, pp. 171-174).

C.R. par W.E.H. Cockle, JRS 93 (2003) pp. 350-351. - Jean-Luc Fournet, ChrEg 78 (2003) Nos 155-156, pp. 326-331. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 52 (2002) pp. 371-373. - Paul Schubert, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2002/2002-03-30.html >.
